title: 820-00165 no green light when battery plugged in
message: 820-00165 no green light when battery plugged in, when battery unplugged board works fine , will not work from the battery only , somehow i have 19v on R7006 even with D7005 removed which means somehow the charger voltage is going directly to the battery ??? , i cant see on the schematic where these two voltage lines may short together if D7005 is removed

title: 820-00165 no green light when battery plugged in
message:
Change Q7130.
Its high-side part is shorted...

Be sure C7125 is good.
